item.title: Can we explain AI model outputs?
item.description:
I gave a short talk on explanability at the Virginia Journal of Social Policy and the Law Symposium on Artificial Intelligence at UVA Law School, 21 February 2025.

[_Can we explain AI model outputs? (PDF)](https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/pnkhi9a8iqx797tp468ic/ailaw-symposium.pdf?rlkey=ahzw9ka13335b7odvpaap0jkp&dl=0)
